inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Patients or their attendants giving consent to take part in the study

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: having hyperglycemia (capillary blood glucose ≥10 mmol/L in 2 or more occasions)

inclusion.label: not_met
inclusion.evidence: Patients admitted to adult neurology ward with acute stroke

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: The diagnosis of Paget's Disease of Bone was confirmed

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: Patients with hyperglycemic emergencies (hyperglycemic hyperosmolar state or diabetic ketoacidosis)

exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: Those not giving consent to participate in the study

notes: The patient has Paget's Disease of Bone and is being treated with Bisphosphonate. They have a history of hypertension and DM type 2 in their family.
